title: 25. Stuck at home? Here is what we're doing to stay sane and even productive during these crazy times!
description:
You all know what's going on out there. It can feel isolating, scary and hopeless, but we are all in this together. I hope you're encouraged by these ten things that can make us come out on the other side with a new perspective and some new skills. 

Some of my favorite podcasts can be found here:

The Old Fashioned on Purpose Podcast

The A Beautiful Mess Podcast

How I Built This

Pioneering Today

Homemaker Chic

Get my free 10 day course on how to start a blog HERE.

Follow along with Farmhouse on Boone:

The blog

The Youtube channel

Instagram

GRAB MY FREE EBOOKS

5 Steps to an Organized Kitchen Mini Guide

Cleaning with Essential Oils

5 Kefir Smoothie Recipes

Farmhouse Favorites Sourdough Recipes

OUR WATER FILTER

Berkey water filter

You can get the review HERE

Join my Facebook group, “Simple Farmhouse Life”

Get my free essential oils class to learn all about the oils we use in the farmhouse! Watch it HERE.

Thanks again for listening and I'll see you in the next episode of the Simple Farmhouse Life podcast!
dc:creator: Lisa Bass
